questions_1.question: Identify the evidences of leakage from the #7 carbon seal.
Options: Significant oil puddling inside the C-sump cover vent tube aft of the carbon seal.
Wetness on the outside of the exhaust centerbody around the vent opening.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Increased oil consumption, Significant oil puddling inside the C-sump cover vent tube aft of the carbon seal, Wetness on the outside of the exhaust centerbody around the vent opening."
